permafrost.tundra.lang

Class ObjectHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.ObjectHelper

  • public final class ObjectHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Objects.

    • Method Detail

      • equal

        public static boolean equal(java.lang.Object firstObject,
                            java.lang.Object secondObject)
        Returns true if the given objects are considered equal; correctly supports comparing com.wm.data.IData objects.
        Parameters:
        firstObject - The first object in the comparison.
        secondObject - The seconds object in the comparison.
        Returns:
        True if the two objects are equal, otherwise false.

      • compare

        public static int compare(java.lang.Object object1,
                          java.lang.Object object2)
        Compares two Objects.
        Parameters:
        object1 - The first Object to be compared.
        object2 - The second Object to be compared.
        Returns:
        A value less than zero if the first object comes before the second object, a value of zero if they are equal, or a value of greater than zero if the first object comes after the second object according to the comparison of all the keys and values in each document.

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(java.lang.Object object)
        Returns true if the given object is considered empty.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to check the emptiness of.
        Returns:
        True if the object is considered empty.

                               java.lang.String className)
                        throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Returns true if the given object is an instance of the given class.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to be checked against the given class.
        className - The name of the class the given object will be tested against.
        Returns:
        True if the given object is an instance of the given class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the given class name is not found.

      • arrayify

        public static java.lang.Object[] arrayify(java.lang.Object item)
        Returns the given item if it is already an array, or a new array with the given type whose first element is the given item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be converted to an array.
        Returns:
        Either the item itself if it is already an array or a new array containing the item as its only element.

      • listify

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Object> listify(java.lang.Object item)
        Returns a List containing all elements in the given item if it is an array, or a List containing the item itself if it is not an array.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be converted to a List.
        Returns:
        Either a List containing all elements in the given item if it is an array, or a List containing the item itself if it is not an array.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                            java.lang.Class<T> klass,
                            boolean required)

        Type Parameters:
        T - The class to convert the object to.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to be converted.
        klass - The class to convert the object to.
        required - If true and the object could not be converted, throws an exception.
        Returns:
        The given object converted to the given class.
